title: Credit cards bring experiences to woo the young and affluent
description: Credit and debit cards offering discounts on travel, experiences, and lifestyle are gaining popularity among affluent and young customers. Banks like Bank of Baroda, HDFC Bank, and HSBC are partnering with travel companies to provide exclusive offers. The trend is driven by rising demand for unique experiences and live events.
